Hymn.Arabic: إمنحنى بهجة خلاصك , وبروح رئاسى أعضدنى .
Hymn.English: 12 Restore to me the joy of Your salvation, And uphold me by Your generous Spirit.

Hymn.Arabic: نجنى من الدماء يا الله إله خلاصى , يبتهج لسانى بعدلك. الليلويا
Hymn.English: 14 Deliver me from the guilt of bloodshed, O God, The God of my salvation, And my tongue shall sing aloud of Your righteousness.     Alleluia
